name: Fool's Arena
description:
Made for the AI and Games Jam 2021, with the theme "Breaking the rules".

You are an alien fighting a duel against a robot. Sadly this robot does not appear to want to lose, and will cheat it's way to victory, breaking every rule possible. How long can you survive this rigged duel?

Controls:

  • WASD to move.
  • Left mouse click to fire.

Music by abstraction, great stuff!
